Text:
Scene group FLT have released the PROPER of Dishonored. Check the PROPER note here.

    The SKIDROW release doesnt properly handle the Steam API. As a result, the
     game does not show any required information when you load a saved game.
     So finding your wanted save game, is like fishing in the dark, because all
     saved games basically look the same. We included a screenshot on our ISO

HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

YOU CAN USE YOUR OLD SAVES WITH THIS CRACK!

You just need to transfer them to the new saves storage folder.

Move them from C:Users[YOURUSRNAME]AppDataLocalSKIDROW205100Storage

to: C:Users[YOURUSRNAME]AppDataLocalFLTSteam205100remote

If you're having problems finding the folder, do a windows search for 205100, make sure you put them in the NEW saves folder, it's the one with the FLT in the path. Your welcome!

Whoops, paths didn't show up properly. Also *You're* welcome! 

It's C: -> Users -> [YOURUSRNAME] -> AppData -> Local -> SKIDROW -> 205100 -> Storage

to the NEW SPOT: C: -> Users -> [YOURUSRNAME] -> AppData -> Local -> FLT -> Steam -> 205100 -> remote
